name: Arachnocide
description:
Set on an alien planet, fight your way through waves of spiders while you search the space station for clues from the past. 

WASD to move mouse to aim and mouse left click to shoot. Tab to pause the game and R to restart and Escape to exit.

For controllers move with left joystick, aim with right joystick shoot is right trigger and options to pause the game.

Habin P: Programmer and Level Designer

Christiana L: Programmer

Alex C: Game Artist

Daquan G: Sound Designer

Raffy M: Graphic designer
